===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|いなずま|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{compound|いな|tr1=ina|t1=[[rice]] plant|つま|tr2=tsuma|t2=[[spouse]]|lang=ja|sort=いなずま}}. From an old folk belief that lightning joined with the rice plant to bring it to seed. {{rendaku2|tsuma|zuma|sort=いなずま}}
